name: Dragon Attack Game Play
description:
Dragon Attack

A dragon trying to survive fighting a group of dragons trying to eliminate it
A game of endless combat by the dragon who shoots at his opponents dragons in a more realistic environment and more clear and realistic designs to go beyond the stages to make playing more difficult
The game is flexible with smooth control

If you liked the game and wanna support the development of the next projects, to consider donating via this site. I appreciate all the supports.

I hope you enjoy
